ARGUMENT
k m

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-decpmat | |- decompPMat = ( m e. _V , k e. NN0 |-> ( i e. dom dom m , j e. dom dom m |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i m j ) ) ` k ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( M e. V /\ K e. NN0 ) -> decompPMat = ( m e. _V , k e. NN0 |-> ( i e. dom dom m , j e. dom dom m |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i m j ) ) ` k ) ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_dmeq | |- ( m = M -> dom m = dom M ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( m = M /\ k = K ) -> dom m = dom M ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( ( m = M /\ k = K ) -> dom dom m = dom dom M ) |
| 6 |  | #P_oveq | |- ( m = M -> ( i m j ) = ( i M j ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( m = M -> ( coe1 ` ( i m j ) ) = ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( m = M /\ k = K ) -> ( coe1 ` ( i m j ) ) = ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( m = M /\ k = K ) -> k = K ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_fveq12d | |- ( ( m = M /\ k = K ) -> ( ( coe1 ` ( i m j ) ) ` k ) = ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 5, 10 | #P_mpt2eq123dv | |- ( ( m = M /\ k = K ) -> ( i e. dom dom m , j e. dom dom m |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i m j ) ) ` k ) ) = ( i e. dom dom M , j e. dom dom M |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( M e. V /\ K e. NN0 ) /\ ( m = M /\ k = K ) ) -> ( i e. dom dom m , j e. dom dom m |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i m j ) ) ` k ) ) = ( i e. dom dom M , j e. dom dom M |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_elex | |- ( M e. V -> M e. _V ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( M e. V /\ K e. NN0 ) -> M e. _V ) |
| 15 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( M e. V /\ K e. NN0 ) -> K e. NN0 ) |
| 16 |  | #P_dmexg | |- ( M e. V -> dom M e. _V ) |
| 17 |  | #P_dmexg | |- ( dom M e. _V -> dom dom M e. _V ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( M e. V -> dom dom M e. _V ) |
| 19 | 18, 18 | #P_jca | |- ( M e. V -> ( dom dom M e. _V /\ dom dom M e. _V ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( M e. V /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( dom dom M e. _V /\ dom dom M e. _V ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_mpt2exga | |- ( ( dom dom M e. _V /\ dom dom M e. _V ) -> ( i e. dom dom M , j e. dom dom M |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) e. _V ) |
| 22 | 20, 21 | #P_syl | |- ( ( M e. V /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( i e. dom dom M , j e. dom dom M |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) e. _V ) |
| 23 | 2, 12, 14, 15, 22 | #P_ovmpt2d | |- ( ( M e. V /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( M decompPMat K ) = ( i e. dom dom M , j e. dom dom M |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) ) |
